acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Ram  Yadav is produced  from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.           Learned advocate for the accused prayed for time for consideration of charged.            Copy furnished to the accused person.            Fixing 30.09.2019 for production  C/C

Accused Shri Ram Yadav is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date.           Heard learned lawyers of the both sides as well as case diary. Perused the case record. Considering all aspects I find that the accused Shri Ram Yadav has committed the offences under sections 8/4/6 of the POCSO Act and accordingly charges are framed. The particular of the offences charged are duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. CWC is asked to submit report on the next date as to where at present the victims are staying.          Seen the bail petition filed by one Smti Sarita Devi praying for allowing the accused Shri Ram Yadav who has been in the jail hazot since 25.08.2019 in connection with this case to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition supported by an affidavit. Heard learned lawyers of the both sides. Perused the case record.           It has been submitted by the learned lawyer appearing on behalf of the accused person that as charge sheet has been submitted further detention of the accused person is not necessary at all. He has further submitted that for the fair trial accused needs to be out of the bar. It is a case wherein accused has been alleged of committing of aggravated penetrative and penetrative sexual assault upon his own daughters. In my considered opinion if accused is allowed to go on bail entire prosecution case will be frustrated. Hence the bail prayer is rejected.          Fixing 14.10.2019 for report and production.
PO is on long vacation. Accused produced from jail hazot and further remanded till next date. pws absent. re issue summon to pws.
Accused is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PW Ashis Kumar Gupta is examined cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs

Accused produced from Jail Hazat and further remanded till next date .PWs Rajkumar Gupta, Miss Soni Yadav and Miss Anjali Yadavr are examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs.
Accused is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PW Miss Soni Yadav is produced by CWC Diphu. She is re-examined and discharged. Issue fresh summons to rest PWs

Accused Ram Yadav is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.     PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.   Fixing 07/12/2019 For production  F/ Evidence
Accused  is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PWs Smt. Moni Mazumdar and Smt. Kalpana Choudhury are examined, cross-examined and discharged.

Accused is produced from the jail hazot. PW Smti Sabita Devi is present. The prosecution has declined to examine her. She is discharged. Issue summons to MO and IO.         Fixing 03.01.2020 for MO and IO.
Accused Ram Yadav is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PW Dr. Kaban Teronpi and I.O M.Thadoi SIngha are examined, cross-examined and discharged.
Accused produced from jail hazat and remanded till next date. he is examined under section 313 Cr.P.C

Present- Sri Kalyanjit Saikia(AJS)Addl. Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu   Case record is received from Honble Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.   Accused is absent with step.   Judgement could not delivered as accused is absent.
Accused Ram Yadav is absent with step vide petition No 273 Showing cause of absence which is allowed.
accd Ram Yadav  present.        heard argument both sides,
court works disrupted due to COVID 19for argmnt
